title: Date Night: Intimacy
description: For COUPLES. Deepen your romantic bond and rediscover each other.

cards.content: What is your favorite memory of us?
When did you first realize you liked/loved me?
What is one thing I do that makes you feel loved?
What is a fear you have about our relationship?
WILDCARD
What is something you want us to achieve together?
What is your favorite physical feature of mine?
How do you think we have changed since we met?
What is something you've been hesitant to tell me?
What song reminds you of me?
If we could travel anywhere tomorrow, where would we go?
What is one way I can support you better?
What is your favorite date we've ever been on?
WILDCARD
Do you think we communicate well?
What is a habit of mine you find cute?
When do you feel most connected to me?
What is a secret fantasy you have?
If you could relive one day of our relationship, which one?
What do I do that makes you laugh the hardest?
How do you describe me to your friends?
What is the biggest challenge we have overcome?
WILDCARD
cards.back: Whisper something you love about me in my ear.

cards.content: Do you feel appreciated by me?
What is one thing you want to do with me before we die?
What is your favorite non-sexual intimacy?
Do you think we are soulmates?
What is something you learned from me?
When am I at my best?
What is one thing you would never want to change about us?
How do you want to be loved?
WILDCARD
cards.back: Take a selfie together right now.

cards.content: What is a misunderstanding we had that you want to clear up?
What is the most romantic thing I've ever done for you?
Do you feel safe with me?
What is a goal I can help you reach?
What makes you proud to be my partner?
If we had a theme song, what would it be?
What is something you want to tell me but haven't found the right time?
WILDCARD
cards.back: Slow dance to no music for 1 minute.

cards.content: What is your favorite time of day with me?
Are you satisfied with the amount of time we spend together?
What is one thing you admire about my family?
What is a small thing I do that annoys you?
How do you know I love you?
What are you most excited for in our future?
Why did you choose me?
